P

Pawn - Class in com.chess.piece
Pawn class is a child class of the Piece class It deals with the construction and movement of the Bishop piece on the board and other specific methods needed for the pawn piece The methods found here are: calculateLegalMove(), movePiece(), isColA(), isColH(), and toString()
Pawn(int, Color) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.Pawn
 
Pawn(int, Color, boolean) - Constructor for class com.chess.piece.Pawn
 
PAWN - com.chess.piece.Piece.PieceType
 
PawnCaptureMove(Board, Piece, int, Piece) - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Move.PawnCaptureMove
 
PawnEnPassantMove(Board, Piece, int, Piece) - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Move.PawnEnPassantMove
 
PawnJump(Board, Piece, int) - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Move.PawnJump
 
PawnMove(Board, Piece, int) - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Move.PawnMove
 
PawnPromotion(Move) - Constructor for class com.chess.board.Move.PawnPromotion
 
Piece - Class in com.chess.piece
Piece is a parent class for all the other piece types within it is also an enum for the piece types The methods found here are: computeHashCode(), equals(), getColor(), getPieceType(), isFirstMove(), getPiecePosition(), getPieceValue(), and abstract methods which are calculateLegalMove() and movePiece()
Piece.PieceType - Enum in com.chess.piece
an enum class that specifies the piece type of each piece with values which will be needed by the minimax algorithm and other methods that will be needed in the program especially the Castling moves
pieceColor - Variable in class com.chess.piece.Piece
 
pieceType - Variable in class com.chess.piece.Piece
 
Player - Class in com.chess.player
Player is a parent class It has methods that is applicable for both players black and white
playerKing - Variable in class com.chess.player.Player
 
position - Variable in class com.chess.piece.Piece
 
POSITION_TO_TILE - Static variable in class com.chess.board.BoardUtils
